courses.title: Intro to Vue.js
courses.description: If you're just getting started with Vue, here's where to get going. We cover all the basics and give you challenges so you can learn by doing.

courses.title: Vue 3 Essentials
courses.description: Understanding the upcoming features in Vue 3 that enable developers to create scalable Vue applications.

courses.title: Real World Vue.js
courses.description: Pass the basics, we'll show you more techniques that are need to ship Vue applications. Topics include Vue CLI, Vue Router, Single File Components, and API calls.

courses.title: Mastering Vuex
courses.description: Learn how to handle state in a production level application with Vuex, Vue's own state management pattern and library.

courses.title: Next Level Vue
courses.description: Learn more advanced real-world practices on routing, component loading, code reuse, and forms.

courses.title: Unit Testing
courses.description: Strengthen your Vue apps by adding unit testing to your components using Jest and Vue Test Utils

courses.title: Animating Vue
courses.description: Bring your web interface to life and improve your user experience with Vue animations.

courses.title: Beautify with Vuetify
courses.description: Learn how to create beautifully styled and structured web apps using Vuetify, a material design component framework.

courses.title: Scaling Vue with Nuxt.js
courses.description: Once you are comfortable with Vue, learning a framework like Nuxt.js allows you to create production-ready web apps which follow best practices

courses.title: Token-based Authentication
courses.description: Learn how to control access to certain parts of your app by implementing user authentication with JWT.

courses.title: Watch us build a Trello Clone
courses.description: Core team member Damian Dulisz joins Gregg Pollack to build a Trello clone in Vue.js together. We build the app using Vuex, local storage, the browser drag and drop API, and lots of component refactoring.

courses.title: Advanced Components
courses.description: Discover the full functionality of Vue components with Gregg Pollack & Evan You, the creator of Vue.
